ai_alert_notifications: Targeted users can view their AI alerts
ai_analysis_logs: Admins can view AI analysis logs
System can create AI analysis logs
ai_incident_flags: Admins can view all AI incident flags
ai_model_configurations: Admins can manage AI model configurations
ai_models: Super Admin can manage AI models
ai_monitoring_sessions: Admins can view all AI monitoring sessions
System can manage AI monitoring sessions
ai_providers: Super Admin can manage AI providers
call_notifications: Users can view their own notifications
call_session_features: Call participants can view call session features
card_interpretations: Users can view interpretations for their readings
chat_messages: Users can send messages to their sessions
Users can update their own messages
Users can view messages from their sessions
chat_monitoring: Admin users can view all monitoring data
chat_sessions: Admins can view all chat sessions
Users can update their chat sessions
Users can view their chat sessions
configuration_access_log: Super Admin can view all access logs
Super Admin can view system access logs
Users can view their own access logs
configuration_change_log: Super Admin can view all change logs
Users can view their own change logs
emergency_call_pricing: Admins can manage emergency call pricing
Everyone can view emergency call pricing
emergency_call_transactions: Admins can view all emergency call transactions
Users can view their emergency call transactions
emergency_siren_control: Admins can see targeted emergency sirens
Readers can see emergency sirens for available readers
Super admins can manage all emergency sirens
exchange_rates: Admin write access for exchange rates
Public read access for exchange rates
feature_ai_assignments: Super Admin can manage feature assignments
learning_progress: Users can update their own progress
Users can view their own progress
reader_emergency_settings: Admins can view all reader emergency settings
Readers can manage their emergency settings
reading_cards: Users can view cards for their readings
secret_providers: Allow authenticated users to read secret providers
Allow super_admins to manage secret providers
special_rates: Anyone can view active special rates
Readers can manage their special rates
spread_categories: Super admins and admins can manage all categories
system_configurations: Public configurations are readable by authenticated users
Super Admin can manage all configurations
system_integrations: Super Admin can manage system integrations
tarot_cards: Anyone can view active tarot cards
tarot_deck_card_images: Enable read access for authenticated users
tarot_deck_reader_assignments: Enable read access for authenticated users
tarot_readings: Users can view their own readings
tarot_spread_reader_assignments: Enable read access for authenticated users
user_enrollments: Users can view their own enrollments
user_preferences: Users can manage their own preferences
user_spreads: Users can manage their own spreads
webrtc_call_events: Call participants can view events for their calls
webrtc_call_sessions: Admins can view all call sessions
Call participants can view their sessions
webrtc_device_capabilities: Admins can view all device capabilities
Users can manage their device capabilities
webrtc_quality_logs: Call participants can view quality logs
working_hours: Anyone can view available working hours
Readers can manage their working hours
